website_summaries.verdict: Don’t need to file state taxes and have a fairly simple tax situation? This version walks filers through the process with clear, intuitive interview questions.
pros: The software transfers last year’s tax information smoothly
Free product assistance over the phone is a nice bonus
Allows multiple returns for family members
cons: Filers with more complex situations who need to do an itemized return should choose a different version

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Why pay a preparer for something you can do yourself ?
customer_reviews.text: I have used Turbo Tax for years. I've used the standard versions as well as Home and Business version and the guidance provided in the software makes it easy for all but the very complicated tax situations. Now that I'm retired and my tax situation is simple ( Social Security for wife and me, Pension and Vanguard investments) I now use Turbo Tax Basic and it covers everything I need. It allows either full itemization of deductions or use of the standard deduction. Highly recommended. So simple even a cave man can do it. :)
customer_reviews.author: RICKVOO

customer_reviews.title: This basic edition was all I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have used Turbo Tax for decades (way back to when it was written by ChipSoft). Now that I am retired my taxes are fairly simple to do but I still would rather file via software and e-file. I live in a state that does not tax retirement income or Social Security so I did not need the state tax software. The Basic edition was more than adequate. I filed electronically and received my refund before Valentines day. This year's edition was as versatile and easy to use as last year. I do wish they would remove the idiot message ("it's taking longer to load") over the years it has lost its charm!
customer_reviews.author: K. Keppel

customer_reviews.title: Annual bow to Uncle Sam
customer_reviews.text: if you have Windows or Mac. Linux people are SOL.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T Satchell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Program
customer_reviews.text: We have used TurboTax for many years, and the result has always been successful. As seniors, our tax preparation is now simple, but in the years when we had many donations and other details TurboTax walked us through our taxes with precision. TurboTax saves us time and money, and we recommend it for seniors who may be overwhelmed by the idea of preparing their own taxes to those who have investments and other complexities. The review provided in the program give us the security of knowing that our taxes will meet IRS requirements, and we have never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: P. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: IRS Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Have used TurboTax for several years now. Trust in their program and calculations. Never have had a problem with the IRS. Electronic filing has always been easy with quick refunds. A definite re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Z.

customer_reviews.title: Program is defective as it does not update as required. You end up in continuous “update” loop!
customer_reviews.text: Program will not update as required to function. Wasted three hours trying to make it work. Will not recommend. There are other cheaper options that work better.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I always get the disc which I can file just in case. After updating I had my return done the day I got my tax data. Quick and easy as my return was done and sent within 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Watcher

customer_reviews.title: Turbo Tax Great
customer_reviews.text: What I did not expect was the cost of State Tax no matter which program I got it would have been the same I have used turbo tax for years never any problems but having to buy turbo tax plus almost $50 State tax Doubt I will use it again
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: After Doing All That Work, Now It Won't Save.
customer_reviews.text: Everything Lost!!!! It saved fine when installed back in April but, now, after updating and After Doing All That Work, It Won't Save. Can't even do a Save-As to a new location. Error 102348 > There link to this error also does not work!!!
customer_reviews.author: Spaceman

customer_reviews.title: Turbo Tax 2019
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Turbo Tax for many years - but no more. It has just got too extreme complicated, and sometimes asking worthless questions. I would NOT recomment it for retired people. I will not be using it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle L. Looger

customer_reviews.title: A little difficult to install from CD
customer_reviews.text: Finally was able to load after downloading the program from Quicken’s website. The CD didn’t load properly so my only other choice was download the file from Quicken. Good thing they offer this action after opening the CD package.
customer_reviews.author: Majr98a

customer_reviews.title: If you have Windows 7 be aware of this issue
customer_reviews.text: I am a long-time user of TurboTax. After installing all went perfectly on my Windows 7 laptop. Then after an update, it would not allow any changes. After struggling to figure out what happened, I learned, in an online posting, that before opening the program I needed to select the compatibility mode for Windows 7.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Worthless.
customer_reviews.text: This version of Turbotax Basic does not import data fro last year. It does not track previous years cumulative capital lost. It makes you go through unnecessary step that wait your time for a simple return.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nieh

customer_reviews.title: Using it since the 90's.
customer_reviews.text: Been using TTAX since the 1990's, it's always done the job well for me. At my age and status, will most likely move to the Free online version for 2020 and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: BROKEDADDY

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Have used Turbo Tax for about 30 years. Never fails me. Always accurate. easy to use. fast - once I have all my documents just an hour or two and I'm done! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: A. Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Taxing Situation
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used TurboTax for many years. The importing the previous years return information is a breeze. I don’t enjoy doing my taxes but this tax ware makes it tolerable and I more easily get through it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy My Boy

customer_reviews.title: Turbo Tax is Great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Turbo Tax for years. It is a great product. I always appreciate receiving the disc instead of downloading. I will continue using this product providing the disc is available for me to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bill Butsko

customer_reviews.title: I always use this for my taxes
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and I am finished in 2 hours. I e-file and receive the refund very quickly. I recommend this software to anyone who plans to do their taxes.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: DOESN’T WORK!!!
customer_reviews.text: TurboTax will not open after downloading updates on Windows 7, though it has that option. Waste of money. I have used TurboTax for many years and the changes to this years software has made it useless.
customer_reviews.author: bharp

customer_reviews.title: Very limited
customer_reviews.text: With the new tax law change taking effect in 2018, I thought that Basic was what I needed. Wrong! Intuit limited the basic so you still need to buy Deluxe.
customer_reviews.author: Abb

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use reliable and a decent price
customer_reviews.text: I've loved this for about a decade. Its simple to use, reliable, accurate, and like having your own accountant sitting there.
customer_reviews.author: Arty B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Turbo Tax for many years. The ease of operation is outstanding. We highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jimmpak

customer_reviews.title: Been use this product since 2005.
customer_reviews.text: I will not buy basic again. For me Deluxe or better. This do not have enough deductibles.
customer_reviews.author: Shaborn

customer_reviews.title: To complicated
customer_reviews.text: I don’t pay taxes on my social security and this software has no place to claim your income on social security
customer_reviews.author: David Mccrum

customer_reviews.title: Turbo Tax
customer_reviews.text: We've been using Turbo Tax for years. This version was not available in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: ScrappinGreatGramma

customer_reviews.title: Buy the next step up  Basic will cost you more
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize NY State tax app isn’t included $29 extra to add to app
customer_reviews.author: vin

customer_reviews.title: Helped me figure out all issues
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for years and it gets better at helping a guy getting older and slower
customer_reviews.author: William J. Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Too many requests by Turbo Tax trying to get you to upgrade or file your State taxes.
customer_reviews.text: Great except for too many requests by Turbo Tax trying to get you to upgrade or file your State taxes.
customer_reviews.author: M&K

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I've used Turbo Tax for Federal taxes for about 10 years in a row. It takes concentration but it's well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Simple to Use
customer_reviews.text: Clear and easy to use. Takes the burden out of tax filing.
customer_reviews.author: K. Trupp

customer_reviews.title: Turbo Tax Software
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this software now for over 20 years. Because my wife and I are retired, we no longer have to itemize and are using Turbo Tax Basic. It is by far the most accurate and comprehensive way to tackle your taxes and at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works great
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it this year yet, but it worked great last year and the year before. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Heinemann

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Makes taking care of your taxes easy as following the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Logan liedtke

customer_reviews.title: Fit our Needs
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both filed our federal taxes using Basic Turbo Tax. The program guided each of us step by step.
customer_reviews.author: JOANNE

customer_reviews.title: This is all you need if you live in a state with no state income tax.
customer_reviews.text: Mostly easy to use. Occasionally I ran into terms I did not understand but usually the definitions are easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Ed E.

customer_reviews.title: Turbo Tax - Federal Tax Only
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Turbo Tax. But it has been harder to find just the Federal Tax version. Amazon to the rescue , again.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind J. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 11 years. Never had a problem with the IRS.
customer_reviews.author: richard amaral

customer_reviews.title: Very easy
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty easy as I don’t have thing to deduct and my taxes are basic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product activation
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere in your description does it say that i need internet access to activate the product. Now i have a $30 lump of plastic. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TurboTax Basic 2019 Tax Software [PC/Mac Disc]
product_meta.description:
TurboTax Basic is recommended if you have a straight-forward tax situation, do not need to file state taxes or you want to claim the Earned Income Tax Credit TurboTax is tailored to your unique situation-it will search for the deductions and credits you deserve, so you're confident you'll get your maximum refund 

 *  TurboTax coaches you every step of the way and double checks your return as you go to handle even the toughest tax situations, so you can be confident you're getting every dollar you deserve.
 *  Every year it gets even easier. As a returning customer, TurboTax will automatically transfer last year's data to help ensure accuracy and save you time 
 * Up-to-date with the latest tax laws-so you can be confident your taxes will be done right. 
 * Help along the way-get answers to your product questions, so you won't get stuck.
 * Your information is safeguarded - TurboTax uses encryption technology, so your tax data is protected while it's e-filed to IRS and state agencies
feature_bullets: TurboTax Basic is recommended if you have a straight forward tax situation, want to claim the Earned Income Tax Credit and only need to file a federal income tax return
No need to know taxes, answer simple questions and TurboTax will do the rest
MAXIMUM TAX REFUND - TurboTax gets your taxes done right and the biggest refund you deserve
TAXES DONE RIGHT - TurboTax guides you through your tax preparation, keeping you up to date with the latest tax laws and double checking your entries along the way.
Includes 5 free federal e-files, state preparation additional
Free U.S. based TurboTax product support via phone
SAVE TIME- Automatically imports financial information including W-2s and imports prior year tax return information from TurboTax and other tax software.
